=== Current ===
* Working on a plan to bring Ubuntu Hour back to the area.

=== Past ===

* Learn more about Ubuntu at an Ubuntu Hour!  Demonstrations and guidance provided.

* Get help testing or installing Ubuntu or just get some questions answered and socialize with cool people!  

* Official Ubuntu installation media will be available.  If possible, please bring a blank CD-R, CD-R/W disk, or 4 gigabyte USB stick.

* Email to schedule a meetup!
